item.title: Motion Practice Reel
item.description: The character designs were provided by the course, and I decided to design my own background for the second and third animation seen in the video above. Included below are looping gifs of the frame-by-frame rough passes for each assignment Out of 10 animal designs to choose from for this assignment, I thought that the owl and kangaroo could have an interesting jump and float transitional movement

item.title: Motion Practice Walk Cycle
item.description: A walk cycle assignment for the course “Motion Practice.” Wanted to do a walk cycle where the character switches to walking backwards for a bit, and then spins back forward

item.title: 2021 Reel
item.description: A collection of some of my personal and client work between late 2019 and early 2021

item.title: It's Spring Stop Scrolling
item.description: Design, animation, and sound, for a social post for Compadre studio. Sound design is not something I do often, but was something I found really fun to do for this project

item.title: Motion Secrets Final
item.description: There was a time limit of 7 seconds for this assignment which made it quite tough to fit what was essentially 3 different shots into it, while having it loop as well

item.title: Motion Secrets Reel
item.description: A really great course that combined traditional 2d animation principles with after effects

item.title: Home Loop
item.description: A personal animation where I mainly wanted to focus on interesting transitions between each shot

item.title: Morphing Grid
item.description: Exploring different ways typography could animate within a poster-like format

item.title: Shape 05
item.description: Shape layer animation experiments in a poster-like format

item.title: Mech City Run
item.description: A personal project that explored different software. The buildings were created from recessing and extruding simple geometry in Blender, situated at different distances to create a bit of a parallax effect. The mech design was designed in illustrator and rigged with Duik in after effects

item.title: Seed & Stem
item.description: An assignment from a course called “Advanced Motion Methods” with a focus on shot transitions based on provided style frames

item.title: Focus IO
item.description: An assignment from a course called “Advanced Motion Methods” focusing on match-cut transitions based on provided style frames

item.title: Blend 3015
item.description: An assignment from a course called “Advanced Motion Methods” where more complex shot transitions were explored based on provided style frames

item.title: Science Addicts Unite
item.description: An assignment from a course called “Advanced Motion Methods” that had a mix of after effects and Cinema 4D based on provided style frames

item.title: UI 03
item.description: Futuristic HUD animation that has a main rig to control most of the animation, based off of expression in after effects

item.title: Shape 04
item.description: A personal project with a focus on simple shapes and a sense of frenetic energy

item.title: Overwatch Banner
item.description: Design and animation for an Overwatch League watch party spot, with the design heavily inspired by the triangles used in the Overwatch Logo

item.title: Glitch 02
item.description: Fun misc animation I did during downtime at work. Wanted to convey frenetic speed and energy
